data.title: Human Development Index vs. GDP per capita
data.meta_description: The Human Development Index (HDI) is a summary measure of key dimensions of human development: a long and healthy life, a good education, and a decent standard of living. GDP per capita is adjusted for inflation and differences in the cost of living between countries.
